mapper.select: select NAME from PROJECTS where SCOPE = 'PRJ';

select PROJECTS.NAME, LIVE_MEASURES.VALUE from LIVE_MEASURES right join PROJECTS on LIVE_MEASURES.PROJECT_UUID = PROJECTS.UUID left join SNAPSHOTS on LIVE_MEASURES.COMPONENT_UUID = SNAPSHOTS.COMPONENT_UUID where LIVE_MEASURES.METRIC_ID = 52 and PROJECTS.SCOPE = 'PRJ' and SNAPSHOTS.ISLAST;
